name: Foodie - Fill One Line Puzzle
description:
Foodie - Fill One Line Puzzle is an interesting puzzle game with simple & easy-to-handle gameplay. Drag the little happy pig, eat all the food on the board and fill up the pig's stomach by drawing out one-line on the screen as fast as you can.


FEATURES:

• Nice & Bright Designed Interfaces
• Diversified Foods for You to Unlock
• Activate Your Brain to Solve Puzzles
• Try to Find the Best Solution


CONTACT US:
support@puzzlegames.freshdesk.com


Fill one line to solve the puzzle games and enjoy the happy time to eat tasty food like dessert, cookies, cakes, hamburgers, etc.
